name: Ông địa
description:
It was cruel when my grandmother used to bring up the story of my Ông địa eating children to bully me into eating rice. Of course I believe it, because every time when the Mid-Autumn Festival comes, there is always a fat man with distorted facial features dancing wildly in the middle of the drums and drums. That's why I never looked forward to the moon collect
When I grew up, I found out that none of my friends have a maternal grandmother like me. Feeling that it was unfair to be alone in fear of the land, I resolved to spread this fear to the next generation of children. Every year in the Mid-Autumn Festival, by dressing up as a Ông địa, I scare children around the neighborhood. Seeing their happy faces turn pale, then cry out in fear, I felt so happy
